description: Rate overall economic condition of country today
notes: All waves. W1-W2 (1=very bad to 5=very good) HIGHER=BETTER. W3-W6 (1=very good to 5=very bad) HIGHER=WORSE. Must reverse W3-W6

description: Change in country economic condition over last few years
notes: All waves. W1-W2 (1=much worse to 5=much better) HIGHER=BETTER. W3-W6 (1=much better to 5=much worse) HIGHER=WORSE. Must reverse W3-W6

notes: All waves. W1-W2 (1=much worse to 5=much better) HIGHER=BETTER. W3-W6 (1=much better to 5=much worse) HIGHER=WORSE. Must reverse W3-W6
